name: SYNTHETIK: Arena
description: Face the varied challenges of the Machine God Zir in ARENA, a standalone expansion for Synthetik: Legion Rising! Leverage the next level in gun-play and experiment with powerful tech in varied action packed Arenas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, Vista or higher Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 2.7 GHz / AMD FX 8320 3.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460, Radeon HD 5770, 768 MB Vram Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, Vista or higher Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 3.6 GHz / AMD QC A8-7670K 3.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560+ Series, Radeon R9 270+ DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space
